'''White Chestnut Oak Wood "Harpoon" Street Lamp''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for White Chestnut Oak Wood "Harpoon" Street Lamp is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Tequemecan Valley}} after defeating {{Enemy|Swiftstep Seeker|x=2}} and {{Enemy|Yumkasaurus Warrior: Whirling Leaves|x=2}}.

</gallery>
